channel.title: CVE Feed for Rilwis -- Private Messages For WordPress (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rilwis -- Private Messages For WordPress (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-29442|2024-08-03T06:26:04.879Z -- rilwis -- private%20messages%20for%20wordpress%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (subscriber or higher user role) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Messages For WordPress <= 2.1.10 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-29441|2024-08-03T06:26:04.868Z -- rilwis -- private%20messages%20for%20wordpress%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Private Messages For WordPress plugin <= 2.1.10 at WordPress allows attackers to send messages.
